sdf:title: Circuit Breaker (IEC 61850)
sdf:copyright: copyright 2019 Open Connectivity Foundation, Inc. All rights reserved.
description: This Resource describes functions for the control and monitoring of IEC 61850 based circuit breaker.

status.description: The circuit breaker status. The status can only be reset out of bounds.

ratedcurrent.description: The rated current in Ampere, defined at manufacturing time.

ratedbreakingcurrent.description: The rated breaking current in Ampere, defined at manufacturing time.

ratedvoltage.description: The rated voltage in Volts, defined at manufacturing time.

insulationresistance.description: Insulation resistance of circuit breaker (M Ohm).

timestamp.description: An RFC3339 formatted time indicating when the data was observed (e.g.: 2016-02-15T09:19Z, 1996-12-19T16:39:57-08:00). Note that 1/100 time resolution should be used.
